short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An IDE used for creating / managing bookmarklets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and manage your bookmarklets with ease.  Find a bookmarklet online?  Add it to the IDE easily by right clicking the snippet and adding it to the IDE.  The IDE uses a bookmarklet folder in your Chrome bookmarks, so you still have full control.  The bookmarklet IDE is also themeable.
